helio.materialiser.configuration

Class HelioConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.configuration.HelioConfiguration

  • public class HelioConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the configurable elements of the Helio materialiser software
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_BASE_URI
      Default base URI used internally
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CACHE_ID
      Default id of the MaterialiserCache
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_DATA_HANDLER_PLUGINS_PACKAGE
      Default package where the DataHandler are allocated, this package is where this software or the plugins projects MUST allocate their DataHandler implementations
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_DATA_INTERACTORS_PACKAGE
      Default package where the DataProvider and DataHandler are allocated
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_DATA_PROVIDER_PLUGINS_PACKAGE
      Default package where the DataProvider are allocated, this package is where this software or the plugins projects MUST allocate their DataProvider implementations
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_FUNCTIONS_PLUGINS_PACKAGE
      Default package where the Functions are allocated, this package is where this software or the plugins projects MUST allocate their classes extending the Functions abstract class
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_H2_PERSISTENT_CACHE_DIRECTORY
      Default folder to store the MaterialiserCache data
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_RDF_FORMAT
      Default format that Helio uses internally to represent the RDF data
      static H2Evaluator EVALUATOR
      The evaluator used to evaluate expressions, or perform the linking task.
      static MaterialiserCache HELIO_CACHE
      The specific MaterialiserCache used by this software, it can be changed with any other object implementing the MaterialiserCache interface.
      static java.lang.String PLUGINS_FOLDER
      Default folder that contains plugins
      static java.lang.Integer SYNCHRONOUS_TIMEOUT
      Default synchronous time out for threads
      static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit SYNCHRONOUS_TIMEOUT_TIME_UNIT
      Default synchronous time out units
      static java.lang.Integer THREADS_HANDLING_DATA
      Default number of threads that translate chunks of data into RDF
      static java.lang.Integer THREADS_INJECTING_DATA
      Default number of threads for injecting RDF triples
      static java.lang.Integer THREADS_LINKING_DATA
      Default number of threads for linking RDF triples

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void configure(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonConfiguration)
      This method parses the content of a Json document with the available configurations, and then, sets up Helio with such configuration
      static void readConfigurationFile(java.lang.String file)
      This method reads a file containing a Json document with all the available configurations, and sets up Helio with such configuration

    • Method Detail

      • readConfigurationFile

        public static void readConfigurationFile(java.lang.String file)
        This method reads a file containing a Json document with all the available configurations, and sets up Helio with such configuration
        Parameters:
        file - the path of the file contaning the configuration

      • configure

        public static void configure(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonConfiguration)
        This method parses the content of a Json document with the available configurations, and then, sets up Helio with such configuration
        Parameters:
        jsonConfiguration - a valid JsonObject containing the advanced configurtion
